T.query: select p.productid,pv.businessentityid from product p join productvendor pv on p.productid = pv.productid  join vendor v on pv.businessentityid = v.BusinessEntityID join productmodel pm on pm.productmodelid = p.productmodelid join unitmeasure u on u.unitmeasurecode = p.sizeunitmeasurecode

F.query: select p.productid,pv.businessentityid from product p left join productvendor pv on p.productid = pv.productid left join vendor v on pv.businessentityid = v.BusinessEntityID join productmodel pm on pm.productmodelid = p.productmodelid join unitmeasure u on u.unitmeasurecode = p.sizeunitmeasurecode

select p.productid,pv.businessentityid from product p join productvendor pv on p.productid = pv.productid join vendor v on pv.businessentityid = v.BusinessEntityID join productmodel pm on pm.productmodelid = p.productmodelid join unitmeasure u on u.unitmeasurecode = p.sizeunitmeasurecode

select p.productid,pv.businessentityid from product p left join productvendor pv on p.productid = pv.productid left join vendor v on pv.businessentityid = v.BusinessEntityID join productmodel pm on pm.productmodelid = p.productmodelid join unitmeasure u on u.unitmeasurecode = p.sizeunitmeasurecode
